مرحباً نحن شركة VRE Tech للخدمات الالكترونية الخاصة بالفعاليات والحفلات. Visual reality event technology تكتولوجيا فعاليات العالم الإفتراضي اسست الشركة عام 2020 في مدينة دبي بدولة الامارات العربية المتحدة وهي متخصصة بمجال التطبيقات الخاصة بالفعاليات والحفلات. وتطبيق build your event هو احد التطبيقات الخاصة بالشركة وهو الاول من نوعه حيث يوفر للعميل كل ما يحتاجه مع اجل عمل فعالية او حفل، حيث ان العميل لن يحتاج اي شخص او اي شركة لإدارة فعاليه، فعلى سبيل المثال اذا كان لديك مؤتمر او اي حفل فيمكن استخدام التطبيق كي تستاجر الكراسي والطاولات والمسرح والشاشة والورود وخدمة الضيافة والاعلانات واختيار الرعاه الذي يمكن ان يرعو هذا الحفل او المؤتمر وكل ما يلزمك لعمل الفعالية التي تريدها، كما يمكنك البحث عن مدير لإدارة فعاليتك، كما يمكنك حجز الصالة المناسبة لإقامة العفالية. مع تطبيق build your event ستدير فعاليتك بنفس وستوفر الوقت والمال. عن المالك شركة VRE Tech مملوكة للمصمم يوسف عبدالله بكر، ولد في مدينة حلب السورية عام 1985 حاصل على شهادة التصميم الغرافيك من جامعة تشرين السورية، عمل في مجال التصميم الاعلاني والديكور والتصميم ثلاثي الابعاد اكثر من 13 سنة ولديه العديد من الجوائز والدروع التزكارية من عدة جهات من حكومة الامارات العربية المتحدة اهدافنا توفير الجهد والمال وجعل كل شخص يستطيع إدارة فعاليته بنفسه. رؤيتنا جعل عالم الفعاليات اكثر سهولة وفي متناول الجميع.

Terms and conditions Welcome Before you accept the Terms and conditions You have to read well Terms and conditions for lessor 1- every company will upload the products by them self 2- every company should manage products by them self. step by step availability, quantity, date available. And will by have full responsibility about all products you add, if any company will not following the products, we will stop business with them directly. 3- Not allowed to add any logo or contact or website or any thinks about your company on your projects photos or products details. Wallpaper of products photo should by white color. 4- We will check all products before adding to Apps 5- All companies should double check if the products it is in good condition or no because you should receive same condition you handover, and if any company will not follow our structure we will stop the business with them. 6- Every company should send one or more employee with wearing our T-shirt have logo App, and your employee have full responsibility to load and unload the products and fix and remove the projects. 7- In some products we will have warranty money. Will hold it until retune the products in good condition or if the projects will not in good condition we will deduct from amount. 8- We will deduct 10% of the amount of rental feed as service feed. 9- The rental feed will hold in app management until the costumer receive the products in good condition, then you will receive 50% of amount and balance amount will receive while finish the event and retune the products. 10- In (safety products Section) you have to load photo of your products once you load and unload so we will know how was products condition. 11- If you have (3D Model) of your projects will by more good, but it iss not important.
Terms and conditions for tenant 1- Before you receive the Products you should chick if it iss in good condition or not because you have to retune in same condition you receive. 2- Whenever you order you have to deposit some money on some products as warrant to have over the Products in same condition and then we will return your money. 3- The price will not include fixing and delivery in some Conditions, if there is so will adding to your bill before you complete the payment. 4- In (safety products Section) you have to load photo of your products once you load and unload so we will know how was products condition.
If you read all Terms and conditions please accept. Because if you not read you will be have full responsibility after that.
Note 1- Before you receive the Products you should chick if it is in good condition or not because you have to retune in same condition you receive. 2- Whenever you order you have to deposit some money on some products as warrant to have over the Products in same condition and then we will return your money. 3- The price will not include fixing and delivery in some Conditions, if there is so will adding to your bill before you complete the payment. 4- In (safety products Section) you have to load photo of your products once you load and unload so we will know how was products condition.
